name: Recoil (itch) (deviltortoise)
description:
Recoil is a top down, 2 player versus shooter where players move only through bursts of speed either from dashing, or by firing their cannon.
  • Both actions run on short timers so make sure you think about what you're doing so you don't get caught out standing still.
  • Remember to use your cannon as a movement tool - it will save you more often than you realise.
To Play Recoil you MUST have 2 controllers plugged in at the same time  Controls

Both players must use controllers as the prototype stands - The following controls are based on usage of an Xbox controller.

Use the left analog stick to choose a movement angle (there is no indication) but don't worry you can then press the left shoulder button to dash in the determined direction. The Right analog stick decides the rotation of the gun (currently the whole tank) and pressing the right shoulder button will fire in that direction and kick you backwards as a result of the recoil. (Hence the title)
